header.description: Options to use when writing a node as an XML string.

content.name: indents
content.description: Number of times to indent this node. This will increase by 1 for each recursive call, unless minify = true. (Default = 0)

content.name: minify
content.description: Whether or not the output XML should be minified (i.e. have all of its unneeded whitespace removed). If true, then indents and spacesPerIndent will be ignored, and the output will appear on one line. (Default = false)

content.name: spacesPerIndent
content.description: Number of spaces to use per indent. (Default = 2)

content.name: writeComments
content.description: Whether or not to include comments. It is recommended to set this to false when minify = true. (Default = true)

content.name: writeProcessingInstructions
content.description: Whether or not to include any XML processing instructions other than the XML declaration at the top of the file. It is recommended to set this to false when minify = true. (Default = true)

content.name: writeXmlDeclaration
content.description: Whether or not to include the XML declaration at the top of the file. Only applicable to document nodes. (Default = true)
